local_intent: Perceive the plate, move above it, place the bread at plate_center with yaw 0 and gentle press, then verify release.
assumptions: PlaceAt handles lowering and release during placement
plate_center is a valid precomputed pose
Bread is grasped before placement begins
coherence_with_global: Aligns with the global place phase: detect/confirm plate, move above, PlaceAt with yaw=0 and press_force=10, then verify bread is no longer in gripper.
